about_the_game:
Once upon a time, there were three beautiful girls. They lived happily together. Until one day, the three sisters moved out of their home and decided to become self-reliant.
Unexpectedly, someone had long been eyeing this opportunity...
Can you break through the hearts of the three sisters and win their love?
All the answers lie in — Love's Trio!

【Game Features】─────────────────────────────────────────────▣

  • Three beautiful girls with different personalities: the naturally lively Aisha, the tsundere Natalie, and the ice-cold Vivian. Three characters, a total of fifteen seductive scenes for you to enjoy!

  • Big head and small head fight side by side: While encountering beautiful girls, you must break through their layers of defenses. Each level you break through increases their affection for you?!

  • Play all content with one hand: completely free up your other hand! As for what to do... you know~

  • Replay mode: Once you unlock a scene, you can savor the hard-won sweet memories in the gallery~

  • No, I really can't think of anything: After careful research, I found that it is exactly the same as a regular match-3 game, but I still ● it!

【Gameplay Instructions】─────────────────────────────────────────────▣


This is a game combining beautiful girls + match-3 gems + GALGAME. By breaking through levels, you increase your affection with the three sisters, and eventually you can...?!

【Special Thanks】─────────────────────────────────────────────▣


"Morning" Kevin MacLeod
“Pleasant Porridge" Kevin MacLeod
"Almost Bliss" Kevin MacLeod
"Midnight Tale" Kevin MacLeod
"Smooth Lovin" Kevin MacLeod
"Cold Sober" Kevin MacLeod
Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 4.0 License

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains some naked , sexual acts or pornographic content, All characters are over 18 years old
